item.title: 达芬奇定时截图静帧 Grab stills every specified time
item.description: * 目标：数据集构造 * Goal: Grab Stills for dataset * 任务：从开始时间码到结束时间码之间，每隔指定时间截图静帧到图库 * Task: From the start timecode to the end timecode, grab still frames to the gallery every specified time * 语言：Python * Language: Python * 软件：达芬奇 * Software: DaVinci Resolve testing clip is the trailer of OPPENHEIMER <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/DR_GrabStills <!DOCTYPE html> Code <!DOCTYPE html> code @juneleung 20230821 <!DOCTYPE html>

item.title: CG & DI色彩管理 Color Management in CG&DI
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 目标: 不同软件内监看颜色一致 <!DOCTYPE html> Goal: To keep colors’ exactness across software * 本测试所有文件和工程: @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI * All files and projects can be downloaded from: @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI * 本测试使用 OCIO 和 ACES 1.2 进行色彩管理 * This test uses OCIO and ACES 1.2 for color management <!DOCTYPE html> 色卡 ColorChecker * 本测试使用的色卡为 ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr , 其他色卡可以从 @colour-science: colour-nuke 下载 * The ColorChecker used in this test is ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr , other ColorCheckers can be downloaded from @colour-science: colour-nuke <!

item.title: Davinci Resolve API
item.description: Updated as of 26 May 2023 <!DOCTYPE html> Resolve Fusion() –> Fusion % Returns the Fusion object. Starting point for Fusion scripts. GetMediaStorage() –> MediaStorage % Returns the media storage object to query and act on media locations. GetProjectManager() –> ProjectManager % Returns the project manager object for currently open database. OpenPage(pageName) –> Bool % Switches to indicated page in DaVinci Resolve. Input can be one of (“media”, “cut”, “edit”, “fusion”, “color”, “fairlight”, “deliver”).

item.title: 电影数据库爬虫 Web crawler for Movie Database
item.description: * 目标：电影数据库建设 * Goal: movie database construction * 任务：根据电影信息，如电影名，查找对应的豆瓣和IMDB网页 * Task: find the corresponding Douban and IMDB web pages according to the movie information, such as the movie name * 语言：Python * Language: Python <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/bsDoubIMDB <!DOCTYPE html> Code <!DOCTYPE html> code @juneleung 20230330 <!DOCTYPE html>

item.title: 剪辑和调色的交接物料 Turnover between editing and DI color grading
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 当你完成一个片子的剪辑之后，应该如何将你的工作完美的交接给DI呢？ <!DOCTYPE html> How to turn over your editing work to DI perfectly after you finish editing a film ? * 本文章所述不一定符合所有情况，请根据具体项目酌情进行修改。 * The descriptions in this article may not be applicable to all situations, please modify as appropriate according to specific projects. <!DOCTYPE html> 1、导出参考小样 Export Reference 一个剪辑完成片的视频，以供调色公司的画面套底参考。 A video of the edited film, as the DI’s conform reference. 具体文件参数 File Parameters: 苹果平台 mac 格式 (Format) : Quciktime MOV 编码 (Codec) : Apple Prores 类型 (Type) : 422HQ/422/proxy 声音 (Audio) : PCM/AAC 视窗平台 windows 格式 (Format) : MXF 编码 (Codec) : DNxHD / DNxHR 类型 (Type) : 1080p 100/85/80 8bit / DNxHR SQ/LB 声音 (Audio) : PCM/AAC 如e.
